descriptionHtml:
Revealing edit of the Hide Armor!

By request, I\'ve added a version of this for CBBE by Caliente.  This requires the main CBBE mod:

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666

The mesh part of the CBBE version is just a slight tweak of the hide armor from Caliente\'s Vanilla Outfits for CBBE:

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12273

I\'ve added a version of this with the top from the fur armor here: http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2547

There are a few issues:

For some reason the shader or whatever seems to have gotten a bit wonky.  In low-light conditions it can seem either way to bright or too dark.  I\'m not sure what caused this or how to fix it...the only thing I did was add an alpha property to the trishape.

Finally, in low-light conditions I can sometimes see a faint shadowy outline of the original kilt piece.  I don\'t know if this is a baked-in shadow or something...?

So, kinda a work in progress.  You\'ve been warned!
author: Clarian
